title: Update Hibernate to 6.2.8 or 6.3.0 to fix SQLGrammarException for JOINED entity with additional join in query
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm currently running into https://hibernate.atlassian.net/browse/HHH-17008 or https://hibernate.atlassian.net/browse/HHH-16979

Please update Hibernate ORM to 6.2.8 or 6.3.0 as soon as possible and available :pray:

Quarkus version 3.1.0.Final worked, since https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/33498 and the v3.1.1 I can reproduce  this problem.

### Expected behavior

See https://hibernate.atlassian.net/browse/HHH-16979

### Actual behavior

See https://hibernate.atlassian.net/browse/HHH-16979

Or in my case

```
org.hibernate.exception.SQLGrammarException: JDBC exception executing SQL [select a2_0."user_id",a2_0."vault_id",u1_0."id",u1_1."name",u1_0."email",u1_0."picture_url",u1_0."privatekey",u1_0."publickey",u1_0."setupcode",a2_0."vault_masterkey" from "user_details" u1_0 join "authority" a1_0 on a1_0."id"=u1_0."id" join "effective_vault_access" e1_0 on u1_0."id"=e1_0."authority_id" join "access_token" a2_0 on u1_0."id"=a2_0."user_id" and a2_0."vault_id"=? and a2_0."user_id"=u1_0."id" where e1_0."vault_id"=? and u1_0."id"=?] [ERROR: missing FROM-clause entry for table "u1_1"
```

(just copied so others can find this issue)

### How to Reproduce?

See https://hibernate.atlassian.net/browse/HHH-16979

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

>3.1.1.Final up to 3.2.4.Final
